title: Knights
Minesweeper
pagerank
description: Given a set of sentences spoken by each of the characters, determine, for each character, whether that character is a knight or a knave.
An AI to play Minesweeper using Propositional Logic for Knowledge Representation.
An AI to rank web pages by importance similar to Googles original search engine. This implementation uses an Iterative statistical Algorithm. It also verify the results via a Monte Carlo simulation.
